-- SignUp_sql - Login

INSERT INTO db_users 
(email, password_hash, first_name, last_name, vat_number, created_at, updated_at)
VALUES 
('{{inp_registerEmail.text}}', '{{hashedPassword}}', '{{inp_firstName.text}}', '{{inp_firstName.text}}', '{{inp_VAT.text}}', NOW(), NOW());
